faqlist.Question: How do I set up my new camera?
faqlist.Answer: Please refer to the section called Adding Your Camera within your Camera User Guide.

faqlist.Question: How do I set up recording on my camera?
faqlist.Answer: Your camera is automatically configured to record 24/7 by default. To change thenumber of days to store video in the cloud, please contact your service provider.

faqlist.Question: Can I move my camera to a new location in my home or business?
faqlist.Answer: Yes, after the camera has been successfully added to IvedaXpress, you can relocate the camera to anywhere with power and Internet connectivity.

faqlist.Question: What network ports does IvedaXpress use?
faqlist.Answer: https: 443, camera 50000...(pending on tunnel server), RTSP streaming 554

faqlist.Question: How do I configure wireless on my camera?
faqlist.Answer: Please refer to the section called Wireless Settings within your Camera User Guide.

faqlist.Question: What is the MAC address for my camera?
faqlist.Answer: The MAC address can be found the on the back of your camera, or by going to the Settings area in IvedaXpress.

faqlist.Question: Where are my camera settings?
faqlist.Answer: To access your individual camera settings click Settings --> DeviceModify icon for the camera you want to access

faqlist.Question: What mobile apps are available for IvedaXpress
faqlist.Answer:
IvedaXpress for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch (iOS)iTunes App Store
IvedaXpress for Android phones and tablets Google Play.

faqlist.Question: How many cameras can I view at the same time?
faqlist.Answer: In IvedaXpress you can view up to (6) cameras simultaneously.

faqlist.Question: What are the system requirements to access IvedaXpress from a computer?
faqlist.Answer: CPU:Intel Atom 330 or above 1M cache 1.6GHz 533MHz FSB Operating Systems:Windows or Mac OSXScreen Resolution:1280 X 720 recommendedBrowser:Internet Explorer Firefox Chrome or SafariJava Version:Java 7u11 or aboveFor more information on IvedaXpress System Requirements see section System Specifications in your product user guide.

faqlist.Question: How much bandwidth does IvedaXpress require?
faqlist.Answer: Each IvedaXpress camera uses about 0.2 Mbps of upload bandwidth depending on video resolution. Please keep in mind other devices on your network will use the same upload bandwidth.

faqlist.Question: How do I change my registered email address?
faqlist.Answer: Currently you cannot update your email address <Thinking of deleting this one>Yes, can not, only create new account.

faqlist.Question: Can I use my camera outside of the United States?
faqlist.Answer: Yes, you camera will work anywhere with a connection to the Internet after its been added to your account.

faqlist.Question: Can I share access to my camera or recorded video?
faqlist.Answer:
Yes, you can share access to live and recorded video from your cameras with other registered IvedaXpress users. If they are not registered, the end user can register for a new account at http://xpress.megasys.com.tw and click 'Create Account'

To share a camera with a registered user:

Go to Settings
Click the Share button for the camera
Under Share to, enter the IvedaXpress user name of the other end user
Click Share

When the other end user logs into IvedaXpress, they will click the Share button from the homepage to see the camera. They will only have access to live and recorded video for that camera.

faqlist.Question: My WIFI settings changed, how do I change it on the camera?
faqlist.Answer: You will need to plug the camera with an Ethernet cord into your local wireless router. Then power down/power up the camera. Then you can access the camera from xpress.megasys.com.tw where you can make the wireless configuration changes
